scripts.subgraph:start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace=subgraphs/locations" "npm run start --workspace=subgraphs/speakers" "npm run start --workspace=subgraphs/sessions" "npm run start --workspace=subgraphs/ratings"
scripts.subgraph:check:locations: wgc subgraph check locations --schema subgraphs/locations/schema.graphql --label project=apidays
scripts.subgraph:check:speakers: wgc subgraph check speakers --schema subgraphs/speakers/schema.graphql --label project=apidays
scripts.subgraph:check:sessions: wgc subgraph check sessions --schema subgraphs/sessions/schema.graphql --label project=apidays
scripts.subgraph:check:ratings: wgc subgraph check ratings --schema subgraphs/ratings/schema.graphql --label project=apidays
scripts.subgraph:check:all: pnpm subgraph:check:locations && pnpm subgraph:check:speakers && pnpm subgraph:check:sessions && pnpm subgraph:check:ratings
scripts.subgraph:publish:locations: wgc subgraph publish locations --schema subgraphs/locations/schema.graphql --label project=apidays --routing-url http://localhost:5001/graphql
scripts.subgraph:publish:speakers: wgc subgraph publish speakers --schema subgraphs/speakers/schema.graphql --label project=apidays --routing-url http://localhost:5002/graphql
scripts.subgraph:publish:sessions: wgc subgraph publish sessions --schema subgraphs/sessions/schema.graphql --label project=apidays --routing-url http://localhost:5003/graphql
scripts.subgraph:publish:ratings: wgc subgraph publish ratings --schema subgraphs/ratings/schema.graphql --label project=apidays --routing-url http://localhost:5004/graphql
scripts.subgraph:publish:all: pnpm subgraph:publish:locations && pnpm subgraph:publish:speakers && pnpm subgraph:publish:sessions && pnpm subgraph:publish:ratings
